title: Case of the hidden factor
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Gil Brealey and Stanley Dalby
brief_description: Discusses the scope for improvement of storage and handling methods in industry, showing examples of good and poor practice, and the work of the National Materials Handling Bureau in the field.
